title: The Only Scout Left
description: When all the world goes to sleep, 8 year old Lily finds herself totally alone and fighting for survival. Just when she starts getting the hang of it, two strangers with their own problems decide to fill in as foster parents, with disastrous results. Written like a children's book (but for adults only), The Only Scout Left takes you into Lily's mind to tell the harrowing story of the last human beings on Earth. Profoundly moving, desperate and terrifying, The Only Scout Left asks the question: in the face of extinction, are we really worth saving?
author: John   Valentine
